message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to start with a price of $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the value of this product, but that price is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to offer $600,000.

I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $900,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you moving towards a more agreeable price.  To be honest, my absolute limit is $800,000 for this product. If you're able to work with that, I'm ready to close the deal.

I appreciate your honesty about your limit, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $950,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. Let's meet at $950,000. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
